p: Table 4 shows the results of sex-specific analysis. Injection drug use (aOR = 9.42, 95% CI 2.47 to 35.87) and HCV infection (aOR = 13.28, 95% CI 3.20 to 51.70) were related to T. pallidum infection in males. Spouse having syphilis (aOR = 126.66, 95%CI 7.58 to 2122.94), blood transfution (aOR = 10.51, 95% CI 1.58 to 41.21), and HBV infection (aOR = 4.19, 95% CI 1.35 to 10.93) were significantly associated with syphilis in females.
